title: Paul Serban | Super Testing Software Engineer

heroBanner.subheading: I'm Paul, a passionate Software Engineer with a distinct proficiency in Front-end development. My passion lies in crafting dynamic, user-friendly web applications that harness the power of cutting-edge technology.

content.paragraph_1: With a robust skill set in React, JavaScript, TypeScript, and the MERN stack, I excel at creating web solutions that are both aesthetically pleasing and functionally robust. Furthermore, my expertise extends to deploying and managing applications with Docker, AWS, leveraging GitOps strategies, and implementing DevOps practices, ensuring streamlined, efficient, and scalable development processes.
